text: hi everyone today I'm making a very easy
and delicious swiss mac is a caramelized
sweet potatoes this crunchy and sweet
treat is not only tasty but also very
nutritious cut sweet potatoes are rich
in vitamins minerals and fiber let's
begin recipe firstly you want to prepare
a large bowl of water mix with a
teaspoon of salt then peel the potatoes
and cut into bite-size wedges if you
want the sweet potato to be more crispy
you can also think they slice them then
immediately soak those with potato
wedges in the salted water to prevent
darkening next heat the generous amounts
of vegetable oil in a pan until you see
bubbles appear rather chopstick then
gently drop in the sweet potatoes make
sure you use paper towel to wipe up all
the extra moisture outside each potato
wedges otherwise the oil can out splash
a lot fry until all sides are golden
brown you can also double fry to get the
really crispy crust outside the potato
wedges then take them out and rest on
paper towel to drain off the excess oil
next heat a tablespoon of vegetable oil
in a wok add a quarter cup of sugar and
melt under medium heat until the sugar
turns to caramel quickly pouring a
quarter cup of boiling hot water make
sure you use a long letter and stand
away from it because the oil might
splash then toss in those fried sweet
potatoes and then keep stirring on low
heat for about 10 to 15 minutes until
the caramel tuc√°n and coat a thin layer
outside each potato wedge squeeze in a
few drops of lime juice to prevent the
sugar from recrystallizing and then you
have it the delicious caramelized sweet
potatoes you can store in an airtight
container for a week and to serve don't
forget to sprinkle some roasted sesame
on top it's a great afternoon snack for
your tea break I hope you like it and if
you do don't forget to click like and
subscribe to my channel for more
delicious Vietnamese food thank you for
watching bye bye
